name: Uplane
long_description:
Uplane replaces marketing agencies with AI. We generate hundreds of ads with matching landing pages and steer the ad spend across channels like Meta, Google, LinkedIn and others. By connecting to CRM and ERP data, Uplane learns what drives profits and continuously improves campaigns.

We’ve grown from $0 to $29k MRR in only 4 months. Our largest customer recently fired their ad agency at an all-time performance high, just to work with us. Now they get 20 times as many ads per month as before. The landing pages we generate convert up to 3-times as well as the status quo. Even the best marketing managers in the world can’t beat AI at personalization and A/B testing.

Digital marketing is a $740B market with a 10% CAGR. Uplane charges a base fee plus up to 10% of ad spend, outperforming marketing agencies that typically charge 10-30%.
